ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database.providers.firebase

Class FirebaseDatabaseReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database.providers.firebase.FirebaseDatabaseReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseReference

    public class FirebaseDatabaseReference
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseReference
    This is a concrete implementation of DatabaseReference. Its implementation makes use of Firebase API, so needs to be modified if database provider is changed.

      static java.lang.String DATABASE_ADDRESS

      FirebaseDatabaseReference()
      Constructor of a reference pointing to the root of the database.

        public com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener addValueEventListener(com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener valueEventListener)
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseReference
        Add a listener for changes in the data at this location. Each time time the data changes, your listener will be called with an immutable snapshot of the data.

        Description copied from interface: DatabaseReference
        Add a listener for child events occurring at this location. When child locations are added, removed, changed, or moved, the listener will be triggered for the appropriate event.
